Yield 5-6 Servings

Lemon Chicken

Ingredients

  • 2 pounds chicken pieces
  • 2 Tbs. shortening
  • 1 cup cream of mushroom soup
  • 1/2 tsp. salt
  • 2 Tbs. lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp. crushed tarragon leaves
  • dash of pepper

Instructions

  1. In a skillet, brown chicken.

  2. Remove chicken from pan, pour off fat & combine remaining ingredients.

  3. Return chicken to skillet, cover, cook over low heat 45 minutes or until tender.

Main Dishes
